resources.string:
Welcome to our shoe store app! We are excited to offer you a wide selection of the latest footwear styles and trends. 
Our app makes it easy for you to browse, search, 
 and purchase shoes right from your phone. 
To get started, 
 take a look at our instructions screen where you can learn how to navigate our app and 
 make the most of all the features we have to offer. Happy shopping!
